an6.67:4.1: “Mendicants, it’s totally impossible that a mendicant with bad friends, companions, and associates, while frequenting, accompanying, and attending, and following their example, will fulfill the practice dealing with the supplementary regulations.
an6.67:4.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an6.67:4.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill ethics.
an6.67:4.4: Without fulfilling ethics, it’s impossible give up desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form or in the formless realm.
an6.67:5.1: It’s possible that a mendicant with good friends, companions, and associates, while frequenting, accompanying, and attending, and following their example, will fulfill the practice dealing with the supplementary regulations.
an6.67:5.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an6.67:5.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill ethics.
an6.67:5.4: Having fulfilled ethics, it’s possible give up desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form or in the formless realm.”
